title: Watch: Horrific! Ward boy breaks newborn's leg for incessant crying
text:
The infant, born to a person identified as Varnik, was in critical state at the time of birth and was taken to ICU. (Source:Twitter) Shocking visuals have surfaced from a Roorkee Hospital where a ward boy on duty allegedly broke the leg of an infant after he was annoyed by child’s incessant crying. CNN-News 18 reported that the ward boy, deployed at the Intensive Care Unit of the hospital, was annoyed by child’s crying which was causing hindrance in his sleep. The infant, born to a person identified as Varnik, was in critical state at the time of birth and was taken to ICU.
Here’s the video of the incident tweeted by Times Now:
